dv.question_text: How has the availability of (or knowledge about) the alternative pathway to CPA licensure impacted your desire to pursue a graduate degree (MAcc or MBA)?

perception_predictors.question_text: What is your overall perception of the change to CPA licensure pathways that creates an alternative pathway with fewer credit hours and an extra year of work experience?
How has the availability of (or knowledge about) the alternative pathway to CPA licensure impacted your desire to pursue the CPA license?
Were you aware of the alternative pathway to CPA licensure before taking the survey?
